news_header: Dutch Bros Inc shares have surpassed the average analyst target price of $61.27, currently trading at $61.86.
news_original_title: BROS Crosses Above Average Analyst Target
news_text: Dutch Bros Inc (BROS) shares have recently crossed the average analyst 12-month target price of $61.27, trading at $61.86. Analysts may react by downgrading their valuation or raising their target price based on the company's performance. There are 11 analysts contributing to this average, with targets ranging from $36.00 to $70.00. The average rating is from 1 (Strong Buy) to 5 (Strong Sell). Investors are encouraged to evaluate whether the stock's current price indicates further growth potential or if it's time to sell.
